message.body: Bought more board books for #### and have her check, too

Good thing she'll have her own book shelf in the new place! #####, #### and I are about 1:30 away from arriving, but #### was/is sick. And I really hurt my back rocking her last night Wester so much moving stuff, am useless for moving today...
I was so worried she would get my nasty cold
This weekend will be hell for you but things can only get better. Flight to Ithaca delayed and stuck in Newark
Just landed in Ithaca and waiting for a cab
Came home to find Dad had a great fire going in the woodstove so will sleep in the bed you used
